mapper.sql: id, user_name, nike_name, email, mobile, password, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, verify_user, verify_time, is_login, is_enable
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_employee
order by ${orderByClause}
